thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Axis Bank Says Co Sold All Transactions With PNB Against Authenticated SWIFT LOUs

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Axis Bank Says Co Sold All Transactions With PNB Against Authenticated SWIFT LOUs

organizations.name: brief-axis bank says co sold all transactions with pnb against authenticated swift

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Axis Bank Ltd:
* SAYS BANK, THROUGH OVERSEAS BRANCHES, UNDERTAKES TRANSACTIONS AGAINST LETTERS OF UNDERTAKINGS ISSUED BY OTHER BANKS
* SAYS BANK HAS UNDERTAKEN SUCH TRANSACTIONS WITH PNB AGAINST AUTHENTICATED SWIFT LOUS
* SAYS HAS 'SOLD DOWN ALL OF THE REFERRED TRANSACTIONS' Source text - bit.ly/2BsYbG6 Further company coverage:
